comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: Not a Boeing 727, but actually an MD-80, an "MD-81" (DC-9-81) to be exact, N924PS (c/n 48034/946) delivered to PSA in November 1980 and named "Smile of Burbank".  With US Air's takeover of PSA April 1988 the aircraft would be re-registered as N800US and continue in operation until April 2002.  The aircraft would be scrapped sometime in 2005.
